1.text: Brethren, if a man also may be overtaken in any trespass, ye who are spiritual restore such a one in a spirit of meekness, considering thyself—lest thou also may be tempted;

2.text: of one another the burdens bear ye, and so fill up the law of the Christ,

3.text: for if any one doth think himself to be something—being nothing—himself he doth deceive;

4.text: and his own work let each one prove, and then in regard to himself alone the glorying he shall have, and not in regard to the other,

5.text: for each one his own burden shall bear.

6.text: And let him who is instructed in the word share with him who is instructing—in all good things.

7.text: Be not led astray; God is not mocked; for what a man may sow—that also he shall reap,

8.text: because he who is sowing to his own flesh, of the flesh shall reap corruption; and he who is sowing to the Spirit, of the Spirit shall reap life age-during;

9.text: and in the doing good we may not be faint-hearted, for at the proper time we shall reap—not desponding;

10.text: therefore, then, as we have opportunity, may we work the good to all, and especially unto those of the household of the faith.

11.text: Ye see in how large letters I have written to you with my own hand;

12.text: as many as are willing to make a good appearance in the flesh, these constrain you to be circumcised—only that for the cross of the Christ they may not be persecuted,

13.text: for neither do those circumcised themselves keep the law, but they wish you to be circumcised, that in your flesh they may glory.

14.text: And for me, let it not be—to glory, except in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ, through which to me the world hath been crucified, and I to the world;

15.text: for in Christ Jesus neither circumcision availeth anything, nor uncircumcision, but a new creation;

16.text: and as many as by this rule do walk—peace upon them, and kindness, and on the Israel of God!

17.text: Henceforth, let no one give me trouble, for I the scars of the Lord Jesus in my body do bear.

18.text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ is with your spirit, brethren! Amen.
